commentary: The sassy handling of this delivery was my way of saying, if you were on the ball, this is probably what you suspected was true about Aradia all along. This was a fact that was easily surmised but not officially confirmed until now. Any time a fact is reasonably "quessable," I don't think it makes for very good material presented as a  stunning revelation in a straight-faced way by the narrative. So sometimes a jokey non-reveal reveal is a thing that happens in Homestuck. There are always so many dumbfounding twists flying around that sometimes it pays not to be too precious with the unveiling of certain facts. In a different story, the "Aradia turned out to be a
